title.en: Publishing Strategies in Media and Communication

structural_units.address:
Lossi 36
51003 Tartu linn, 
Tartu linn, Tartumaa 
EST

description.en: The course provides an overview of the main principles behind writing a scholarly literature review and formulating one's publishing strategies. After getting acquainted with relevant research literature, the participants of the course will compile their strategies for  publishing peer-reviewed academic articles and present and discuss these at the final seminar of the course.
description.et: Kursus käsitleb erialakirjanduse ülevaate koostamise ja teaduspublikatsioonide kavandamise põhimõtteid ning lõpeb kirjanduse ülevaatel põhineva publitseerimisplaani koostamise ja selle aruteluga doktoriseminaris.

objectives.en: The aim of the course is to develop students skills in analysing academic literature and in planning publishing their research findings.
objectives.et: Ainekursuse eesmärk on arendada doktorandi oskusi analüüsida erialakirjandust ja planeerida uurimistöö tulemuste publitseerimist.

learning_outcomes.en: After taking the course the doctoral student:
-	is well aquainted with the academic literature relevant to their thesis project;
-	is able to identify research gaps and pose research questions;
learning_outcomes.et: - suudab leida uurimistühikuid ja sõnastada uurimisküsimusi;

learning_outcomes.en: -	is able to plan one's academic publishing strategies accordingly.
